definitions.definition: A boiling natural spring which throws forth jets of water , mud , etc., at frequent intervals , driven upwards by the expansive power of steam .
A momentary vertical jet or fountain of fluid driven upwards by a violent force .
An instantaneous , and often dangerous , hot water heater .

main_definition: ( planetology , geology , volcanology ) A boiling natural spring which throws forth jets of water , mud , etc., at frequent intervals , driven upwards by the expansive power of steam .
secondary_definitions: ( by extension ) A momentary vertical jet or fountain of fluid driven upwards by a violent force .
( British , archaic ) An instantaneous , and often dangerous , hot water heater .
( South Africa , South Asia ) A domestic water boiler .
